backend/main.mo: Defines types and state for audit logging, access control, user roles, graph data structures, and broadcasting settings within a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing UX and React Query behavior changes with associated files, components, tests, and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing component purpose, UI behavior, hooks, and system interactions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, role checks, conditional dashboards, and global layout with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen for unauthenticated or unauthorized users with login, principal copy, and access‑request guidance plus ICP status panels.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Displays a detailed audit log entry with formatted timestamps, action labels, severity indicators, and descriptions inside a dialog.
Shows the user's authentication status, principal ID, and backend connection health with options to copy the principal or retry connection.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Provides a UI to configure external security event broadcasting, including enabling the feature and setting an endpoint URL.
Implements a multi-file code editor with category switching, unsaved change warnings, and actions to apply or reset file changes.
frontend/src/components/DashboardViewSwi: Renders toggle buttons allowing users to switch between security and ICP operations dashboards when permitted.
Presents steps and a link for deploying the app via the Caffeine platform with informational alerts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A header component handling authentication, theme toggling, role-based view titles, and optional dashboard view switching.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP network, connection, and canister status with retry and error handling features.
frontend/src/components/IcpControllerMan: Provides UI to grant or revoke ICP Controller roles, including validation, confirmations, and listing existing controllers.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsCatal: A searchable, category-based catalog for viewing, editing, importing, and exporting ICP control settings.
Renders an individual ICP control with the correct input type and change handling.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Wraps and introduces the ICP Controls catalog with a brief description and link anchor.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: UI panel showing prerequisites and step‑by‑step instructions for deploying canisters to the ICP mainnet.
frontend/src/components/InlineLoadingSta: Small inline component that displays a loading message with an icon.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMapCanvas: Canvas-based renderer for network graphs with zooming, panning, theming, and draggable nodes.
frontend/src/components/NetworkMapInspec: Inspector panel for viewing and editing a selected node’s properties and managing edges.
Main panel managing the network graph view, node creation, updates, deletion, and data fetching.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user’s profile name during initial setup.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Displays recent security alerts and flagged users with real-time updates and severity indicators.
frontend/src/components/RolesAccessPanel: UI panel for viewing caller roles, app controller status, and performing controller initialization or transfer actions.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Interactive admin terminal for executing commands, managing history, and logging command outputs using a command registry.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Computes recent security metrics from audit logs and displays alerts and activity summaries.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Tools for superusers to export audit logs, download flagged user data, and record related audit events.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: Form-based interface to create test audit log entries with customizable action types and metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: UI panel for flagging, unflagging, and removing users via principal IDs, displaying a table of flagged users.
frontend/src/components/WebControlQuickT: Client-side tools for exporting, importing, resetting, and validating ICP controller configuration, plus copying the user's principal.
frontend/src/components/WorldWideWebCont: Interface to grant or revoke World Wide Web Controller roles to principals and list existing controllers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Checks backend availability by calling a lightweight status method and exposes connection state and refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardView.ts: Manages which dashboard view is selected based on access rights and stored session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: Loads, validates, and updates ICP Controls configuration using URL params, session storage, and defaults, with helpers to modify individual or multiple settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyNodes.ts: Tracks user-created node IDs per principal using sessionStorage and provides functions to add, remove, clear, and validate stored nodes.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkGraph.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating network graph nodes and edges via the target actor with integrated error handling and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains misc React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, controller statuses, and other backend-driven metadata tied to the current identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useTargetActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor based on current identity and ICP Controls, initializing access control when authenticated.
frontend/src/icp-controls/bindings.ts: Defines helpers for reading, validating, parsing, and serializing ICP control values and retrieving control definitions.
frontend/src/icp-controls/registry.ts: Defines all ICP control categories and control definitions, serving as the registry for configurable ICP settings.
frontend/src/icp-controls/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control categories, control definitions, and options used in the ICP Controls system.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme variables with light/dark modes and component-specific style fixes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin security dashboard including audit logs, management panels, and terminal access.
frontend/src/pages/IcpOpsDashboard.tsx: Displays the ICP operations dashboard with role-based panels, network tools, and a context‑appropriate terminal.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Provides helper functions generating consistent React Query cache keys.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Exports the core terminal command registry.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Implements core terminal commands including help, clear, and security role management with audit logging.
frontend/src/terminal/icpControllerComma: Defines a restricted command set for ICP Controllers, supporting help, clear, and profile commands with audit recording.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Provides helpers for audit recording, error classification, context validation, timestamp formatting, and parsing backend enum values.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Defines terminal command, context, output, and history entry interfaces.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlAudit.ts: Wraps command execution with best‑effort audit logging and consistent error handling for Web Control commands.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlCommandC: Generates large sets of safe, read‑only Web Control command metadata for diagnostics and operations.
frontend/src/terminal/worldWideWebContro: Implements the main command registry, including help, clear, and authenticated Web Control commands.
frontend/src/types/networkGraph.ts: Defines types for network graphs, including nodes, edges, and input structures for creating and updating them.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages code editor file state in localStorage, including loading, saving, applying, and resetting content.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Provides utilities for determining ICP network defaults, validating canister IDs, and resolving network labels and hosts.
frontend/src/utils/icpControlsImportExpo: Provides functions to export, download, import, validate, and read ICP Controls configuration as JSON.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for retrieving, storing, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, colors, animations, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, goals, architecture plans, known issues, and existing features for tracking development progress.
